com.ciscospark.androidsdk.phone

接口 Phone


  • public interface Phone
    Phone represents a Cisco Spark calling device.

    The application can obtain a phone object from Spark object and use phone to call other Cisco Spark users or PSTN when enabled.

    The phone must be registered before it can make or receive calls.

    从以下版本开始:
    0.1

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  Phone.DefaultBandwidth
      The enumeration of common bandwidth choices.
      static class  Phone.FacingMode
      The enumeration of Camera facing modes.
      static interface  Phone.IncomingCallListener
      The interface for a listener for incoming call

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void deregister(CompletionHandler<java.lang.Void> callback)
      Removes this *phone* from Cisco Spark cloud on behalf of the authenticated user.
      void dial(java.lang.String dialString, MediaOption option, CompletionHandler<Call> callback)
      Makes a call to an intended recipient on behalf of the authenticated user.
      void disableVideoCodecActivation()
      Prevents the SDK from poping up an Alert for the end user to approve the use of H.264 video codec license from Cisco Systems, Inc.
      int getAudioMaxBandwidth()
      Return the current maximum bandwidth of audio stream.
      Phone.FacingMode getDefaultFacingMode()
      Default camera facing mode of this phone, used as the default when dialing or answering a call.
      Phone.IncomingCallListener getIncomingCallListener()
      The listener for incoming call
      int getSharingMaxBandwidth()
      Return the current maximum bandwidth of content sharing stream.
      java.lang.String getVideoCodecLicense()
      Return the text of the H.264 codec license from Cisco Systems, Inc.

      Return the URL of the H.264 codec license from Cisco Systems, Inc.
      int getVideoMaxBandwidth()
      Return the current maximum bandwidth of video stream.

      Registers this phone to Cisco Spark cloud on behalf of the authenticated user.

      Pops up an Alert for the end user to approve the use of H.264 codec license from Cisco Systems, Inc.

      Set the max bandwidth for audio in unit bps for the call.

      Set default camera facing mode of this phone, used as the default when dialing or answering a call.
      void setIncomingCallListener(Phone.IncomingCallListener listener)
      Set the listener to listen to the incoming call to this Phone.

      Set the max bandwidth for video in unit bps for the call.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getIncomingCallListener

        Phone.IncomingCallListener getIncomingCallListener()
        The listener for incoming call
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • setIncomingCallListener

        void setIncomingCallListener(Phone.IncomingCallListener listener)
        Set the listener to listen to the incoming call to this Phone.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • getDefaultFacingMode

        Phone.FacingMode getDefaultFacingMode()
        Default camera facing mode of this phone, used as the default when dialing or answering a call. The default mode is the front camera.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • setDefaultFacingMode

        void setDefaultFacingMode(Phone.FacingMode mode)
        Set default camera facing mode of this phone, used as the default when dialing or answering a call. The setting is not persistent.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • register

        void register(@NonNull
              CompletionHandler<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Registers this phone to Cisco Spark cloud on behalf of the authenticated user.

        It also creates the websocket and connects to Cisco Spark cloud.

        Subsequent invocations of this method refresh the registration.

        参数:
        callback - A closure to be executed when completed, with error if the invocation is illegal or failed, otherwise nil.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • deregister

        void deregister(@NonNull
                CompletionHandler<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Removes this *phone* from Cisco Spark cloud on behalf of the authenticated user.

        It also disconnects the websocket from Cisco Spark cloud.

        Subsequent invocations of this method behave as a no-op.

        参数:
        callback - A closure to be executed when completed, with error if the invocation is illegal or failed, otherwise nil.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • dial

        void dial(@NonNull
          java.lang.String dialString,
          @NonNull
          MediaOption option,
          @NonNull
          CompletionHandler<Call> callback)
        Makes a call to an intended recipient on behalf of the authenticated user.
        参数:
        dialString - Intended recipient address in one of the supported formats.
        option - Intended media options - audio only or audio and video - for the call.
        callback - A closure to be executed when completed.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • startPreview

        void startPreview(android.view.View view)
        Render a preview of the local party before the call is answered.
        参数:
        view - an UI view for rendering video.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • stopPreview

        void stopPreview()
        Stop rendering the preview of the local party.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • requestVideoCodecActivation

        void requestVideoCodecActivation(@NonNull
                                 android.app.AlertDialog.Builder builder,
                                 @NonNull
                                 CompletionHandler<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
        Pops up an Alert for the end user to approve the use of H.264 codec license from Cisco Systems, Inc.
        参数:
        builder - AlertDialog builder
        callback - A closure to be executed when completed. true if the user approve the license , otherwise false.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • disableVideoCodecActivation

        void disableVideoCodecActivation()
        Prevents the SDK from poping up an Alert for the end user to approve the use of H.264 video codec license from Cisco Systems, Inc.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • getVideoCodecLicense

        java.lang.String getVideoCodecLicense()
        Return the text of the H.264 codec license from Cisco Systems, Inc.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • getVideoCodecLicenseURL

        java.lang.String getVideoCodecLicenseURL()
        Return the URL of the H.264 codec license from Cisco Systems, Inc.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1

      • setAudioMaxBandwidth

        void setAudioMaxBandwidth(int bandwidth)
        Set the max bandwidth for audio in unit bps for the call. Only effective if set before the start of call. if 0, default value of 64 * 1000 is used.
        参数:
        bandwidth - the suggest value could be Phone.DefaultBandwidth.maxBandwidthAudio.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3.0

      • getAudioMaxBandwidth

        int getAudioMaxBandwidth()
        Return the current maximum bandwidth of audio stream.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3.0

      • setVideoMaxBandwidth

        void setVideoMaxBandwidth(int bandwidth)
        Set the max bandwidth for video in unit bps for the call. Only effective if set before the start of call. if 0, default value of 2000*1000 is used.
        参数:
        bandwidth - the suggest value could be Phone.DefaultBandwidth.maxBandwidth90p, Phone.DefaultBandwidth.maxBandwidth180p, Phone.DefaultBandwidth.maxBandwidth360p, Phone.DefaultBandwidth.maxBandwidth720p, or Phone.DefaultBandwidth.maxBandwidth1080p.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3.0

      • getVideoMaxBandwidth

        int getVideoMaxBandwidth()
        Return the current maximum bandwidth of video stream.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3.0

      • setSharingMaxBandwidth

        void setSharingMaxBandwidth(int bandwidth)
        Set the max bandwidth for content sharing in unit bps for the call. Only effective if set before the start of call. if 0, default value of 4000*1000 is used.
        参数:
        bandwidth - the suggest value could be Phone.DefaultBandwidth.maxBandwidthSession.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3.0

      • getSharingMaxBandwidth

        int getSharingMaxBandwidth()
        Return the current maximum bandwidth of content sharing stream.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3.0
